definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[דרב]] (√ of foll. cf. Ar. dariba become accustomed, trained, dar=aba train, cf. Fl NHWB:i. 444; also Eth. drbaya: (quadrilit.) jaculando infigere, etc.; or, since [[דָּרְבָן]] Aram. in form, & 1Sa 13:21 perh. secondary, possibly regard as Aram. loan-word & connect with Ar. d-ariba be sharp, penetrating (GFM, note of Apr. 1892)).
